name: emi.cluster
description: glite-CLUSTER is a node type that can publish information about clusters and subclusters in a site, referenced by any number of compute elements. In particular it allows to deal with sites having multiple CREAM CE nodes and/or multiple subclusters (i.e. disjoint sets of worker nodes, each set having sufficiently homogeneous properties).
releaseNotes: This release is just a repackaging of EMI-2 glite-CLUSTER components
